text: Gordon Neate (14 March 1941 â€“ 10 May 2019) was an English professional footballer. He played as a full back. Neate was born in Reading. He joined his hometown club as a teenager. He played his first professional game in April 1959. He played 99 games for Reading before retiring due to injury in 1966. He remained at Reading as a non-playing staff member. He retired as the club's groundsman in 2009. Neate died on 10 May 2019, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English footballers Category:People from Reading, Berkshire Category:Reading F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Berkshire
title: Gordon Neate
